column3: The film wasn't very good. I {{c1::didn't enjoy}} it very much.
column4: did enjoy / enjoyed / didn't enjoy / didn't enjoyed

column3: It was warm, so I {{c1::took off}} my coat.
column4: took off / take off / didn't take off / didn't took off

column3: I knew Sarah was busy, so I {{c1::didn't disturb}} her.
column4: disturb / didn't disturb / disturbed / don't disturb

column3: The bed was uncomfortable, and I {{c1::didn't sleep}} well.
column4: wasn't sleep / slept / didn't slept / didn't sleep

column3: Our hotel wasn't very far from the station, so we {{c1::walked}} there.
column4: walk / walked / didn't walk / don't walk

column3: I was in a hurry, so I {{c1::didn't have}} time to call you.
column4: had / did have / didn't have / had not

column3: It was hard carrying the bags. They {{c1::were}} very heavy.
The meal wasn't so expensive. It {{c1::didn't cost}} very much.
column4: cost / did cost / costed / didn't cost

column3: We were hungry, so we {{c1::went}} to a restaurant to get something to eat.

A: {{c1::Are you doing}} anything tomorrow evening?
B: No, why?
column4: Do you do / Are you doing / Will you do

column3:
A: I've decided to learn a foreign language.
B: Have you? Which language {{c1::are you going to learn}}?
column4: do you learn / are you going to learn / will you learn

column3:
A: I can't open this bottle.
B: Give it to me. {{c1::I'll open it}}.
column4: I open it / I'll open it / I'm going to open it

column3:
A: Is Emily here yet?
B: Not yet. I'll let you know as soon as {{c1::she arrives}}.
column4: she arrives / she's arriving / she'll arrive

column3:
A: Are you free tomorrow afternoon?
B: No, {{c1::I'm working}}.
column4: I'm working / I work / I'll work

column3:
A: What time is the film tonight?
B: {{c1::It starts}} at 8.40.
column4: It starts / It's going to start / It will start

column3:
A: Are you going to the beach tomorrow?
B: Yes, if the weather {{c1::is}} good.
column4: is / will be / is going to be

column3:
A: What time {{c1::shall we meet}} tomorrow?
B: How about 8.30?
column4: do we meet / are we meeting / shall we meet
